# Code Map Overview

This document provides a high-level overview of the codebase architecture.

## Modules

- [include](modules/include.md) – This module provides the core abstractions and utilities for managing resources, nodes, execution graphs, and context in a computational graph framework.
- [src](modules/src.md) – This module provides the core execution and management functionalities for running tasks in parallel or sequentially, including task scheduling, resource management, and graph construction.
